title: The Informative label
brief_description: An explanation of how manufacturers test their products and assign ‘facts labels’ giving points to various qualities eg. durability, colour fastness. This enables consumers to compare directly the wares of different manufacturers.
description: An explanation of how manufacturers test their products and assign ‘facts labels’ giving points to various qualities eg. durability, colour fastness. This enables consumers to compare directly the wares of different manufacturers.
